name: @meridius-labs/apple-on-device-ai
description: TypeScript library for accessing Apple's on-device foundation models (Apple Intelligence) with full Vercel AI SDK compatibility

scripts.build:local: bun run build:native && bun run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: tsdown --format esm,cjs --dts --outdir dist --entry src/index.ts --external apple_ai_napi --external fs --external path --external module --external url --external crypto --platform node --target node18
scripts.build:watch: tsdown --watch --format esm,cjs --dts --outdir dist --entry src/index.ts --external apple_ai_napi --external fs --external path --external module --external url --external crypto --platform node --target node18
scripts.validate-binaries: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='build/apple_ai_napi.node'; if(!fs.existsSync(path)) throw new Error('Missing native binary: '+path); console.log('âœ… Native binaries found');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run validate-binaries && bun run build:ts

author: Meridius Labs
